name: Average Television Trivia: TOW The Cake | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Emma.

	Rachel: "Wait, you can't go away this weekend! It's Emma's birthday!"

questions.text: What state were Monica and Chandler going to go for the weekend?
questions.explanation:
Vermont.

	Monica: "That place in Vermont? You can take a hint!"

questions.text: What did Phoebe's step-dad sell so they could have food?
questions.explanation:
Blood.

	Phoebe: "When uhm... when Ursula and I were kids, on our birthday, our step-dad would sell his blood to buy us food!"

questions.text: How old did Ross say Joey will be when Emma sees her first birthday party video?
questions.explanation:
52 & fifty two.

	Joey: "And starting to think about settling down!"

questions.text: Did Jack know who Joey was?
What was the birthday cake supposed to be shaped like?
questions.explanation:
Bunny.

	Ross: "Uh, Rach? Does this bakery by any chance also bake erotic cakes? Say for bachelorette parties?"

questions.text: Jack served in the Korean War.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Monica: "He pretended to be a Quaker to get out of Korea."

Bear.

	Monica: "Phoebe, you get the bear, uhm, Joey, you get the robot, and Chandler and I get the dog."

questions.text: Did Ross fix Emma's cake to look like a bunny?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Ross: "Some can sing, some can dance. I apparently can turn phallic cakes into woodland creatures."

questions.text: What kind of camp did Ross want to send Emma too?
